refnamediv.refpurpose: list statistics related to a black and white bw image.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The -v flag will also dump a histogram of the pixel values.

refsect1.title: METHOD
refsect1.para: Since the pixel values are quantized (have discrete values from 0 to 255), the statistics can be computed from "lump sums" after building a histogram of the input. This results in a fantastic savings in computation while also making a single pass over the input file sufficient.
